verses.verse: הֲלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not חָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> Doth not wisdom תִקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> cry וּ֝תְבוּנָ֗ה <S%H8394><s%> ? and understanding תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> put forth קוֹלָֽהּ׃ <S%H6963><s%> aloud

בְּרֹאשׁ־ <S%H7218><s%> in the top מְרוֹמִ֥ים <S%H4791><s%> of high places עֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> beside דָ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way בֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> in the places נְתִיב֣וֹת <S%H5410><s%> of the paths נִצָּֽבָה׃ <S%H5324><s%> She standeth

לְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> at שְׁעָרִ֥ים <S%H8179><s%> the gates לְפִי־ <S%H6310><s%> at the entry קָ֑רֶת <S%H7176><s%> of the city מְב֖וֹא <S%H3996><s%> at the coming פְתָחִ֣ים <S%H6607><s%> in at the doors תָּרֹֽנָּה׃ <S%H7442><s%> She crieth

אֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <S%H413><s%> to you אִישִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> Unto you O men אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> I call וְ֝קוֹלִ֗י <S%H6963><s%> and my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [is] to the sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of man

הָבִ֣ינוּ <S%H995><s%> understand פְתָאיִ֣ם <S%H6612><s%> O ye simple עָרְמָ֑ה <S%H6195><s%> wisdom וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <S%H3684><s%> and ye fools הָבִ֥ינוּ <S%H995><s%> be ye of an understanding לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> heart

שִׁ֭מְעוּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נְגִידִ֣ים <S%H5057><s%> of excellent things אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1696><s%> for I will speak וּמִפְתַּ֥ח <S%H4669><s%> and the opening שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י <S%H8193><s%> of my lips מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> [shall be] right things

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֱ֭מֶת <S%H571><s%> truth יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> shall speak חִכִּ֑י <S%H2441><s%> For my mouth וְתוֹעֲבַ֖ת <S%H8441><s%> [is] an abomination שְׂפָתַ֣י <S%H8193><s%> to my lips רֶֽשַׁע׃ <S%H7562><s%> and wickedness

בְּצֶ֥דֶק <S%H6664><s%> [are] in righteousness כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> All the words פִ֑י <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There בָּ֝הֶ֗ם נִפְתָּ֥ל <S%H6617><s%> [there is] nothing froward וְעִקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H6141><s%> or perverse

כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> are all נְ֭כֹחִים <S%H5228><s%> They [are] all plain לַמֵּבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> to him that understandeth וִֽ֝ישָׁרִ֗ים <S%H3477><s%> and right לְמֹ֣צְאֵי <S%H4672><s%> to them that find דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> knowledge

קְחֽוּ־ <S%H3947><s%> Receive מוּסָרִ֥י <S%H4148><s%> my instruction וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> and not כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and not silver וְ֝דַ֗עַת <S%H1847><s%> and knowledge מֵחָר֥וּץ <S%H2742><s%> gold נִבְחָֽר׃ <S%H977><s%> rather than choice

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for טוֹבָ֣ה <S%H2896><s%> [is] better חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> For wisdom מִפְּנִינִ֑ים <S%H6443><s%> than rubies וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all חֲ֝פָצִ֗ים <S%H2656><s%> and all the things that may be desired לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יִֽשְׁווּ־ <S%H7737><s%> are not to be compared בָֽהּ׃

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <S%H589><s%> I חָ֭כְמָה <S%H2451><s%> I wisdom שָׁכַ֣נְתִּי <S%H7931><s%> dwell עָרְמָ֑ה <S%H6195><s%> with prudence וְדַ֖עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge מְזִמּ֣וֹת <S%H4209><s%> of witty inventions אֶמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> and find out

יִֽרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שְֽׂנֹ֫את <S%H8130><s%> [is] to hate רָ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> evil גֵּ֘אָ֤ה <S%H1344><s%> pride וְגָא֨וֹן ׀ <S%H1347><s%> and arrogancy וְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> way רָ֭ע <S%H7451><s%> and the evil וּפִ֨י <S%H6310><s%> mouth תַהְפֻּכ֬וֹת <S%H8419><s%> and the froward שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃ <S%H8130><s%> do I hate

לִֽי־ עֵ֭צָה <S%H6098><s%> Counsel וְתוּשִׁיָּ֑ה <S%H8454><s%> [is] mine and sound wisdom אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am בִ֝ינָ֗ה <S%H998><s%> I [am] understanding לִ֣י גְבוּרָֽה׃ <S%H1369><s%> I have strength
בִּ֭י מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> By me kings יִמְלֹ֑כוּ <S%H4427><s%> reign וְ֝רוֹזְנִ֗ים <S%H7336><s%> and princes יְחֹ֣קְקוּ <S%H2710><s%> decree צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H6664><s%> justice

בִּ֭י שָׂרִ֣ים <S%H8269><s%> By me princes יָשֹׂ֑רוּ <S%H8323><s%> rule וּ֝נְדִיבִ֗ים <S%H5081><s%> and nobles כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <S%H8199><s%> [even] all the judges צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth
אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I [אֹהֲבֶיהָ כ] (אֹהֲבַ֣י <S%H157><s%> love ק) אֵהָ֑ב <S%H157><s%> I love וּ֝מְשַׁחֲרַ֗י <S%H7836><s%> me and those that seek me early יִמְצָאֻֽנְנִי׃ <S%H4672><s%> shall find

עֹֽשֶׁר־ <S%H6239><s%> Riches וְכָב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and honour אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> for ה֥וֹן <S%H1952><s%> riches עָ֝תֵ֗ק <S%H6276><s%> [are] with me [yea] durable וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness

ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] better פִּ֭רְיִי <S%H6529><s%> My fruit מֵחָר֣וּץ <S%H2742><s%> than gold וּמִפָּ֑ז <S%H6337><s%> yea than fine gold וּ֝תְבוּאָתִ֗י <S%H8393><s%> and my revenue מִכֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver נִבְחָֽר׃ <S%H977><s%> than choice

בְּאֹֽרַח־ <S%H734><s%> in the way צְדָקָ֥ה <S%H6666><s%> of righteousness אֲהַלֵּ֑ך <S%H1980><s%> I lead בְּ֝ת֗וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst נְתִיב֥וֹת <S%H5410><s%> of the paths מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment

לְהַנְחִ֖יל <S%H5157><s%> me to inherit אֹהֲבַ֥י ׀ <S%H157><s%> That I may cause those that love יֵ֑שׁ <S%H3426><s%> substance וְאֹצְרֹ֖תֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H214><s%> their treasures אֲמַלֵּֽא׃ <S%H4390><s%> and I will fill פ

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD קָ֭נָנִי <S%H7069><s%> possessed רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> me in the beginning דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> of his way קֶ֖דֶם <S%H6924><s%> before מִפְעָלָ֣יו <S%H4659><s%> his works מֵאָֽז׃ <S%H227><s%> From
מֵ֭עוֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> from everlasting נִסַּ֥כְתִּי <S%H5258><s%> I was set up מֵרֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> from the beginning מִקַּדְמֵי־ <S%H6924><s%> or ever אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

בְּאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there תְּהֹמ֥וֹת <S%H8415><s%> When [there were] no depths חוֹלָ֑לְתִּי <S%H2342><s%> I was brought forth בְּאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> were no מַ֝עְיָנ֗וֹת <S%H4599><s%> when [there were] no fountains נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <S%H3513><s%> abounding מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> with water

בְּטֶ֣רֶם <S%H2962><s%> Before הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> Before the mountains הָטְבָּ֑עוּ <S%H2883><s%> were settled לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before גְבָע֣וֹת <S%H1389><s%> the hills חוֹלָֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H2342><s%> was I brought forth

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> While לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor עָ֭שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> While as yet he had not made אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְחוּצ֑וֹת <S%H2351><s%> nor the fields וְ֝רֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> nor the highest part עָפְר֥וֹת <S%H6083><s%> of the dust תֵּבֵֽל׃ <S%H8398><s%> of the world

בַּהֲכִינ֣וֹ <S%H3559><s%> When he prepared שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> was there אָ֑נִי <S%H589><s%> he בְּח֥וּקוֹ <S%H2710><s%> I [was] there when he set ח֝֗וּג <S%H2329><s%> a compass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> upon the face תְהֽוֹם׃ <S%H8415><s%> of the depth

בְּאַמְּצ֣וֹ <S%H553><s%> When he established שְׁחָקִ֣ים <S%H7834><s%> the clouds מִמָּ֑עַל <S%H4605><s%> above בַּ֝עֲז֗וֹז <S%H5810><s%> when he strengthened עִינ֥וֹת <S%H5869><s%> the fountains תְּהוֹם׃ <S%H8415><s%> of the deep

בְּשׂ֘וּמ֤וֹ <S%H7760><s%> When he gave לַיָּ֨ם ׀ <S%H3220><s%> to the sea חֻקּ֗וֹ <S%H2706><s%> his decree וּ֭מַיִם <S%H4325><s%> that the waters לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יַֽעַבְרוּ־ <S%H5674><s%> should not pass פִ֑יו <S%H6310><s%> his commandment בְּ֝חוּק֗וֹ <S%H2710><s%> when he appointed מ֣וֹסְדֵי <S%H4144><s%> the foundations אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

וָֽאֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֶצְל֗וֹ <S%H681><s%> Then I was by him אָ֫מ֥וֹן <S%H525><s%> [as] one brought up וָֽאֶהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become שַׁ֭עֲשֻׁעִים <S%H8191><s%> [his] delight י֤וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> was daily י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> was daily מְשַׂחֶ֖קֶת <S%H7832><s%> rejoicing לְפָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> before בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner עֵֽת׃ <S%H6256><s%> always

מְ֭שַׂחֶקֶת <S%H7832><s%> Rejoicing בְּתֵבֵ֣ל <S%H8398><s%> in the habitable part אַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> of his earth וְ֝שַׁעֲשֻׁעַ֗י <S%H8191><s%> and my delights אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> in בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [were] with the sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men פ

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בָ֭נִים <S%H1121><s%> unto me O ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <S%H8085><s%> Now therefore hearken לִ֑י וְ֝אַשְׁרֵ֗י <S%H835><s%> for blessed דְּרָכַ֥י <S%H1870><s%> my ways יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H8104><s%> [are they that] keep
שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear מוּסָ֥ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction וַחֲכָ֗מוּ <S%H2449><s%> and be wise וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּפְרָֽעוּ׃ <S%H6544><s%> and refuse

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed אָדָם֮ <S%H120><s%> [is] the man שֹׁמֵ֪עַֽ֫ <S%H8085><s%> that heareth לִ֥י לִשְׁקֹ֣ד <S%H8245><s%> me watching עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at דַּ֭לְתֹתַי <S%H1817><s%> at my gates י֤וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> daily י֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> waiting מְזוּזֹ֥ת <S%H4201><s%> at the posts פְּתָחָֽי׃ <S%H6607><s%> of my doors

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֹ֭צְאִי <S%H4672><s%> For whoso findeth [מֹצְאֵי כ] (מָצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> finds ק) חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> life וַיָּ֥פֶק <S%H6329><s%> and shall obtain רָ֝צ֗וֹן <S%H7522><s%> favour מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְֽ֭חֹטְאִי <S%H2398><s%> But he that sinneth חֹמֵ֣ס <S%H2554><s%> against me wrongeth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his own soul כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מְ֝שַׂנְאַ֗י <S%H8130><s%> all they that hate אָ֣הֲבוּ <S%H157><s%> me love מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> death פ
